title: Our Team | Hendrickson Chiropractic | Newton
description: Dr. Todd Hendrickson graduated from Cleveland Chiropractic College in Kansas City in April of 96. He is certified in acupuncture and a wide variety of techniques, and strives to help others achieve optimal health through natural chiropractic care.
cleaned_text: Our Chiropractic Team DR. TODD HENDRICKSON D.C. Dr. Todd Hendrickson graduated from Cleveland Chiropractic College in Kansas City in April of 96. He is certified in acupuncture and a wide variety of techniques, and strives to help others achieve optimal health through natural chiropractic care. Dr. Todd is a dynamic speaker, and is available to give workshops on a wide variety of health topics, including headaches, arthritis, preventing work injuries, digestive disorders, and permanent weight loss solutions. He offers a spinal care workshop on Tuesday evenings at our office. Dr. Todd is a member of the Kansas Chiropractic Association and the International Chiropractic Pediatric Association. DR. LYNNETTE HENDRICKSON D.C., CACCP, FICPA Dr. Lynnette Hendrickson graduated from Cleveland Chiropractic College in Kansas City in April of 96. She is certified in acupuncture and does a wide variety of techniques. She is certified in numerous non-force techniques including.SOT, craniosacral therapy, and Koren Specific Technique. She is also certified in Pediatrics and Maternal Care, with most of her practice being infants, children and pregnant women. Dr Lynnette is certified in the Webster Technique, which is a specific analysis and correction of the pelvis to remove any restrictions that could affect the birth outcome. Many women with breech babies are referred to Dr. Lynnette. The technique, which has an 80% success rate, is non-invasive and allows the baby to turn himself after aligning the mother's pelvis. Dr. Lynnette speaks on many topics, including organic eating, women's hormones, vaccination considerations, ADHD, natural solutions to the complaints of pregnancy, and permanent weight loss solutions. She also provides consultations on natural hormone replacement, vitamins and nutrition, natural pain remedies and homeopathy for infants, children and adults. Dr Lynnette is a member of the Kansas Chiropractic Association, the International Chiropractic Pediatric Association and the National Vaccine Information Center.
